reviewText: Provides the testimonies of the Apostles on the knowledge that Jesus is the Christ and he came for us.
This DVD brings the Holy Spirit of God right into the room where it is being watched.  The Holy Spirit witnesses to our spirits that the content of the DVD is true.

I watched this with a nonmember and had an interesting dialogue afterwards. He didn't express openly his feelings, but I could feel his energy.

Seeing the beautiful, sacred historic sites while listening to chosen righteous men narrate is uplifting and inspires the spirit to speak of the truth of the movie to our souls.

Excellent movie.

This one hour program filmed in Jerusalem; The Sacred Grove; the Kirtland Temple; Nauvoo Illinois and other significant sites, features members of the First Presidency and Quorum of the Twelve Apostles of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints bearing personal testimony of the Savior's divine mission.---taken from the back of the tape case
